title: The Man Who Warned America: The Life and Death of John O'Neill, the FBI's Embattled Counterterror Warrior
description: Traces the career of the FBI counter-terrorism expert who lost his life on September 11 days after beginning his job as chief of security for the World Trade Center, noting his role in the investigations of the Oklahoma City bombing and the attack on the U.S.S. Cole, and citing his warnings prior to September 11 on the possibility of a large-scale terrorist strike. Reprint.
author: Murray Weiss
